Collection Description: Spelling is the branch of English Language Arts that focuses on vowels and consonants, patterns of letters and the sounds they make, combining bases and affixes, breaking words into parts, and even some punctuation marks. You can use these patterns and rules to determine how to spell, as well as how to pronounce, various words and phrases.
